ing: 1/3 cup seedless red grapes, rinsed and dried
des: "Small amounts of the rich blue cheese goodies add just the right flavor to a very fresh tasting salad. This is my nothing-else-could-possibly-make-me-happy-for-dinner salad.  Happy eating!"
ins: Toss together the spinach leaves, grapes, blue cheese, and pumpkin seeds.  Serve with blue cheese salad dressing if desired.
